title: MM_ALDER service memory leak in event handler
description: Memory usage grows continuously in event handler until service crashes. Heap dump shows retention of event listener objects. Issue started after recent deployment.
resolution_steps: 1. Analyze heap dump: jmap -dump:live,format=b,file=heap.bin <pid>
2. Identify leak source in background worker
3. Add proper resource cleanup in finally blocks
4. Implement connection pooling with max age
5. Deploy fix and monitor memory usage
6. Set up alerts for memory threshold (>80%)

title: CIW data validation errors in claims submission
description: CIW claims submission rejecting valid records with validation errors. Error message: 'Invalid reference'. Validation logic too strict and rejecting legitimate edge cases.
resolution_steps: 1. Review validation rules in member registration/validators.py
2. Analyze rejected records to identify pattern
3. Update validation regex to handle edge cases
4. Add exception handling for null/empty values
5. Implement validation bypass for admin users
6. Update unit tests with edge case scenarios
7. Deploy to staging and test with sample data
8. Monitor error rates after production deployment

title: CIW data validation errors in provider enrollment
description: CIW provider enrollment rejecting valid records with validation errors. Error message: 'Invalid date format'. Validation logic too strict and rejecting legitimate edge cases.
resolution_steps: 1. Review validation rules in eligibility verification/validators.py
2. Analyze rejected records to identify pattern
3. Update validation regex to handle edge cases
4. Add exception handling for null/empty values
5. Implement validation bypass for admin users
6. Update unit tests with edge case scenarios
7. Deploy to staging and test with sample data
8. Monitor error rates after production deployment

title: CIW claims processor performance degradation
description: Significant performance degradation in CIW claims processor. Response times increased from 100ms to 8000ms. Database queries show long execution times on providers table.
resolution_steps: 1. Run EXPLAIN on slow queries to identify missing indexes
2. Create composite index on members(column1, column2, column3)
3. Update table statistics: ANALYZE TABLE authorizations
4. Optimize query to use index hints
5. Implement query result caching (Redis)
6. Add database connection pooling
7. Monitor query performance after changes

title: CIW integration failing to sync authorization data
description: CIW integration service unable to synchronize authorization data from upstream system. Sync job completes but data not updated in target database. Last successful sync was 24 hours ago.
resolution_steps: 1. Check CIW integration service logs: tail -f /var/log/ciw/integration.log
2. Verify API credentials and authentication token
3. Test connectivity to upstream system endpoint
4. Validate data transformation logic
5. Clear stale records from staging table
6. Restart integration service
7. Manually trigger sync job and monitor

title: CIW claims processor performance degradation
description: Significant performance degradation in CIW claims processor. Response times increased from 50ms to 3000ms. Database queries show long execution times on providers table.
resolution_steps: 1. Run EXPLAIN on slow queries to identify missing indexes
2. Create composite index on providers(column1, column2, column3)
3. Update table statistics: ANALYZE TABLE claims
4. Optimize query to use index hints
5. Implement query result caching (Redis)
6. Add database connection pooling
7. Monitor query performance after changes

title: Specialty custom form builder module not loading correctly
description: Custom custom form builder module in specialty application fails to load on startup. Browser console shows CSS loading error. Module worked correctly before latest release.
resolution_steps: 1. Check browser console for detailed error stack trace
2. Verify module dependencies in package.json
3. Clear browser cache and CDN cache
4. Check webpack build for missing chunks
5. Verify module export/import statements
6. Rebuild frontend: npm run build
7. Test in multiple browsers
8. Deploy fixed version to production

title: MM integration API returning 504 errors
description: MM REST API endpoints timing out with 504 Gateway Timeout errors. Affects /api/v1/eligibility/check endpoint primarily. Backend processing takes longer than 60s timeout limit.
resolution_steps: 1. Increase nginx timeout: proxy_read_timeout 120s
2. Optimize database query in /api/v1/eligibility/check handler
3. Add query index on frequently filtered columns
4. Implement response caching for read operations
5. Add asynchronous processing for long-running tasks
6. Test with production load simulator

title: MM_ALDER service memory leak in cache manager
description: Memory usage grows continuously in cache manager until service crashes. Heap dump shows retention of cache entry objects. Issue started after recent deployment.
resolution_steps: 1. Analyze heap dump: jmap -dump:live,format=b,file=heap.bin <pid>
2. Identify leak source in event handler
3. Add proper resource cleanup in finally blocks
4. Implement connection pooling with max age
5. Deploy fix and monitor memory usage
6. Set up alerts for memory threshold (>80%)

resolution_steps: 1. Run EXPLAIN on slow queries to identify missing indexes
2. Create composite index on authorizations(column1, column2, column3)

title: MM_ALDER service memory leak in event handler
description: Memory usage grows continuously in event handler until service crashes. Heap dump shows retention of cache entry objects. Issue started after recent deployment.
resolution_steps: 1. Analyze heap dump: jmap -dump:live,format=b,file=heap.bin <pid>
2. Identify leak source in cache manager

4. Implement connection pooling with max age

6. Set up alerts for memory threshold (>80%)

title: MM batch job failing with ConcurrentModificationException
description: Nightly MM batch processing job fails with ConcurrentModificationException. Job processes 100000 records but crashes at random point. No clear pattern in failure timing.
resolution_steps: 1. Review application logs for stack trace
2. Increase JVM heap size: -Xmx4g -Xms2g
3. Implement batch processing with chunking (1000 records/batch)
4. Add null checks and error handling
5. Implement transaction boundaries per chunk
6. Add retry logic with exponential backoff
7. Run test with production data snapshot

title: MM_ALDER service memory leak in event handler
description: Memory usage grows continuously in event handler until service crashes. Heap dump shows retention of connection objects. Issue started after recent deployment.
resolution_steps: 1. Analyze heap dump: jmap -dump:live,format=b,file=heap.bin <pid>
2. Identify leak source in data processing pipeline
3. Add proper resource cleanup in finally blocks
4. Implement connection pooling with max age
5. Deploy fix and monitor memory usage
6. Set up alerts for memory threshold (>80%)

title: Database connection timeout in MM integration layer
description: Users experiencing timeout errors when connecting to MM database through MM integration layer. Error occurs intermittently during peak hours. Connection pool may be exhausted.
resolution_steps: 1. Check database connection pool settings in /etc/mm/config.yaml
2. Increase max_connections from 100 to 200
3. Adjust connection timeout from 10s to 30s
4. Restart MM service: systemctl restart mm_alder
5. Monitor connection pool metrics for 24 hours

title: Specialty report generation extreme slowness
description: Custom specialty reports experiencing extreme slowness. Affects analytics reports. Users unable to access critical business data. Report server load is at 95%.
resolution_steps: 1. Optimize report query to reduce data fetch time
2. Add database query pagination (1000 rows/page)
3. Implement report caching for frequently accessed reports
4. Create database materialized view for aggregations
5. Add background job queue for large report generation
6. Optimize report template rendering logic
7. Scale report server horizontally (add 2 more instances)
8. Monitor server metrics after optimization

5. Add background job queue for large report generation
6. Optimize report template rendering logic
7. Scale report server horizontally (add 2 more instances)
8. Monitor server metrics after optimization

title: Specialty custom workflow failing at notification delivery
description: Custom workflow for specialty processing fails at notification delivery step. Error: 'Timeout exceeded'. Workflow engine shows step timeout after 30 seconds.
resolution_steps: 1. Review workflow definition in specialty/workflows/workflow_4.xml
2. Increase step timeout in workflow engine config
3. Add error handling and retry logic to approval routing
4. Verify external service dependencies are available
5. Implement async processing for long-running steps
6. Add workflow state persistence
7. Test workflow with production-like data
8. Enable detailed workflow execution logging

title: Database connection timeout in MM core service
description: Users experiencing timeout errors when connecting to MM database through MM core service. Error occurs intermittently during peak hours. Connection pool may be exhausted.
resolution_steps: 1. Check database connection pool settings in /etc/mm/config.yaml
2. Increase max_connections from 100 to 200
3. Adjust connection timeout from 10s to 30s
4. Restart MM service: systemctl restart mm_alder
5. Monitor connection pool metrics for 24 hours

title: MM integration API returning 504 errors
description: MM REST API endpoints timing out with 504 Gateway Timeout errors. Affects /api/v1/claims/process endpoint primarily. Backend processing takes longer than 60s timeout limit.
resolution_steps: 1. Increase nginx timeout: proxy_read_timeout 120s
2. Optimize database query in /api/v1/eligibility/check handler
3. Add query index on frequently filtered columns
4. Implement response caching for read operations
5. Add asynchronous processing for long-running tasks
6. Test with production load simulator

title: CIW claims processor performance degradation
description: Significant performance degradation in CIW claims processor. Response times increased from 200ms to 5000ms. Database queries show long execution times on claims table.
resolution_steps: 1. Run EXPLAIN on slow queries to identify missing indexes
2. Create composite index on authorizations(column1, column2, column3)
3. Update table statistics: ANALYZE TABLE members
4. Optimize query to use index hints
5. Implement query result caching (Redis)
6. Add database connection pooling
7. Monitor query performance after changes

title: CIW eligibility checker performance degradation
description: Significant performance degradation in CIW eligibility checker. Response times increased from 200ms to 5000ms. Database queries show long execution times on providers table.
resolution_steps: 1. Run EXPLAIN on slow queries to identify missing indexes
2. Create composite index on members(column1, column2, column3)
3. Update table statistics: ANALYZE TABLE members
4. Optimize query to use index hints
5. Implement query result caching (Redis)
6. Add database connection pooling
7. Monitor query performance after changes

title: MM batch job failing with OutOfMemoryError
description: Nightly MM batch processing job fails with OutOfMemoryError. Job processes 10000 records but crashes at random point. No clear pattern in failure timing.
resolution_steps: 1. Review application logs for stack trace
2. Increase JVM heap size: -Xmx4g -Xms2g
3. Implement batch processing with chunking (1000 records/batch)
4. Add null checks and error handling
5. Implement transaction boundaries per chunk
6. Add retry logic with exponential backoff
7. Run test with production data snapshot

title: MM_ALDER service memory leak in background worker
description: Memory usage grows continuously in background worker until service crashes. Heap dump shows retention of cache entry objects. Issue started after recent deployment.
resolution_steps: 1. Analyze heap dump: jmap -dump:live,format=b,file=heap.bin <pid>
2. Identify leak source in background worker
3. Add proper resource cleanup in finally blocks
4. Implement connection pooling with max age
5. Deploy fix and monitor memory usage
6. Set up alerts for memory threshold (>80%)

title: CIW integration failing to sync provider information
description: CIW integration service unable to synchronize provider information from upstream system. Sync job completes but data not updated in target database. Last successful sync was 12 hours ago.
resolution_steps: 1. Check CIW integration service logs: tail -f /var/log/ciw/integration.log
2. Verify API credentials and authentication token
3. Test connectivity to upstream system endpoint
4. Validate data transformation logic
5. Clear stale records from staging table
6. Restart integration service
7. Manually trigger sync job and monitor

title: CIW data validation errors in provider enrollment
description: CIW provider enrollment rejecting valid records with validation errors. Error message: 'Value out of range'. Validation logic too strict and rejecting legitimate edge cases.
resolution_steps: 1. Review validation rules in eligibility verification/validators.py
2. Analyze rejected records to identify pattern
3. Update validation regex to handle edge cases
4. Add exception handling for null/empty values
5. Implement validation bypass for admin users
6. Update unit tests with edge case scenarios
7. Deploy to staging and test with sample data
8. Monitor error rates after production deployment
